#include<bits/stdc++.h>



using namespace std;



 



#define gc getchar_unlocked



 



void scanint(int &x)



{



    register int c = gc();



    x = 0;



    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());



    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}



}



int gcd(int a,int b)



{



    if(a%b==0)



    return b;



    return gcd(b,a%b);



 



}



int main()



{



    int n,k;



    scanint(n);



    scanint(k);



    int ar[n];



    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)



    scanint(ar[i]);



    int maxans=0;



    for(int i=0;i<n;i++)



    {



        int ans=0;



        int gc=ar[i];



        int j;



        for(j=i+1;j<n;j++)



        {



            gc=gcd(gc,ar[j]);



            if(gc<k)



            break;



        }



        if(j>i+1)



        ans=j-i;



        if(ans>maxans)



        maxans=ans;



            if(maxans>=n-i)



            break;



        }



cout<<maxans<<endl;



 



return 0;}
